channel.title: Hosur Road on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Hosur Road on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Yelagiri
item.description: Really do not recollect how I came first time to Team-BHP web site, specifically their forum. And from then on is kind of hooked though not a car freak myself with limited understanding for these electro-mechanical wonders. What fascinates me is travelogue section of this forum. It is great to find so many passionate souls sharing their trips and tricks. Last November got an unexpected mail about a meet-up @ Yelagiri for Bangalore team-bhpean; was not sure to join or not.
